name: Signal Jammer
description:
Made in 5 days for the Desert Bus for Hope 2020 game jam.

It's kind of a bullet hell/tower defense but you're the tower. In this game, you play as "The Device". Intercept the busser's input signals before they reach the bus.

Best played with a controller.

Music, Art, Programming and Game Design by Thomas Griffin

External Assets/Libraries used:

Rewired - Guavaman Enterprises

Text Animator - Febucci Creations

Master Audio - Dark Tonic Inc.

Universal Sound FX - Imphenzia
